title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk, linen
Technique: two integrated structures, 4&1 satin plus plain weave (brocatelle)
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 50.5 x 27 cm (19 7/8 x 10 5/8 in.)
description: A symmetrical pattern of a curving vine, an urn with birds and lions in blue and yellow. Finished edge.
